purpose: To demonstrate the value of recommended marketing treatments through lifecycle optimization.
title: Case Study #3: Quantify value of recommended marketing treatments stemming from lifecycle optimization project

bullets.text: Approach: Utilizing actual account level data on a vintage MOB basis, overlaid anticipated performance impacts resulting from recommended marketing treatments in order to assess the financial impact of initiatives compared to what would likely happen if nothing was done.
Result: Determined that 3-year net financial lift would have an ROA of 100% delivering an incremental profit of $118k.

reasoning_strategy: Utilizing historical data and modeling anticipated impacts to demonstrate value.
